sentences.en: " Major Jay Gatsby, " I read, " For Valour Extraordinary. "
sentences.cn: “ 杰伊-盖茨比少校, ” 我念道, “ 英勇过人 ”

sentences.en: " There, Jay,'she said -- but her hand as she tried to light a cigarette was trembling.
sentences.cn: “ 你瞧, 杰. ” 她说, 可是她要点支烟时手却在发抖.

sentences.en: A jay emerged from the juniper bush in a flash of blue feathers.
sentences.cn: 只见亮闪闪的蓝色羽毛一闪，一只松鸦从刺柏丛中钻了出来。

sentences.en: Among the giants were Jay Gould, J . P . Morgan, Andrew Carnegie, John D. Rockefeller and Henry Ford.
sentences.cn: 这些人中有杰伊-古尔德 、 J-P-摩根 、 安德鲁. 卡内基 、 约翰-D-洛克菲勒和亨利-福特等.

sentences.en: Herbert will be matched against Jay in the semifinal.
sentences.cn: 赫伯特将在半决赛中和杰伊较量.

sentences.en: I hadn't asked Jordan to tea in order to discuss Mr. Jay Gatsby.
sentences.cn: 我请贝克小姐喝茶,并不是为了谈论杰伊-盖茨比先生.

sentences.en: I thought at first that Jay had been stirring things up.
sentences.cn: 我起初认为杰伊一直在挑起事端。

sentences.en: Jay had always tended to keep his girlfriends at a distance.
sentences.cn: 杰伊一贯和他的女朋友们保持距离。
杰伊点点头，笑容慢慢隐去了。

sentences.en: Mr. Jay wears the pants in that family.
Queen Latifah and Jay Leno round out this all - star cast.
sentences.cn: 皇后?拉蒂法以及杰?雷诺的加入使这份明星卡司声势更为浩大.

sentences.en: She should have squared things with Jay before she went into this business with Walker.
sentences.cn: 她本该在和沃克联手进入这一行之前先征得杰伊的同意。

sentences.en: There's a dark side to Jay's character.
sentences.cn: 杰伊的性格中有阴险的一面.

trans.tran_cn: 松鸦，过分多嘴的人，喋喋不休的人
trans.tran_en: a bird of the crow family that is noisy and brightly coloured
